title: Web Designer and Developer
job_overview:
We are seeking a full-time designer/developer with mainly graphic design skills to:
• Redesign of our websites and add plugins
• Logo redesign
• Design various landing pages and web-forms
• Design Facebook and Instagram ads
• Design ads for google business profile etc 
• create short video ad etc 
1 Month full time agreement with a view to using you as freelancer thereafter.  Send your resume to Upgrade to see actual info
